column4: I was gonna try opensuse, but I can't imagine how long that would take me.
Especially if it's more than one disk.
I'm gonna go target for my next hd!
Ubuntu is rockin it, my only qualm is the whole alsa/sound issue.
I don't even really have anything on either harddrive to "keep" anymore though, since I've been changing os's so much.
I'm not sure, I think so.
because Windows doesn't like not being the main hd or whatever.
I use Nicotine for all my p2p needs.
I wanna try getting osx on my pc....(spoken softly)
Nicotine ask me for a passwd? Which pass?
A pass and a login nicotine ask me.
Just fill it in with whatever you want.
